title: Plex Feature Request for External Guids
body:
Please go vote on this Plex Feature Request. This will benefit all 3rd party applications that integrate with Plex by making them more efficient.

Thanks!

title: Auto-updater Removed from Windows exe
body: Windows exe users will need to manually download and install v2.6.7 (and all future versions) since the auto-updater was removed. You can download the new installer from the GitHub Releases page. Your Tautulli data will not be affected.

title: End of Python 2 Support
body:
Tautulli v2.6.3 is the last version to support Python 2. Python 3 will be required to continue receiving updates.

You can check your Python version listed in the configuration below. If the Python version is 3.6.x or newer then no action is required, otherwise please refer to the GitHub Wiki page for instructions on how to upgrade to Python 3.

title: New Plex Movie Agent
body:
PMS 1.20.0 beta introduces a new Plex Movie agent. The new agent does not include external metadata provider IDs in the API (such as the IMDB ID or TMDb ID) which are used by Tautulli and many other community applications.

Please go vote on this feature request on the Plex Forums so that these IDs can be accessed through the API again.

The external metadata provider IDs have been added back in PMS 1.20.1.

title: Lifetime Plex Pass Giveaway
subtitle: <s>I am giving away a Lifetime Plex Pass to celebrate the release of Tautulli v2.5</s>
body:
Visit the Reddit announcement post or Discord server for details on how to enter.

The giveaway is now over. Thank you to everyone who participated.

title: Python 3 Support
subtitle: Tautulli now supports both Python 2 and Python 3
body: Tautulli can also be installed on Windows and MacOS without needing to install Python. You can download the new app installer from the GitHub Releases page. Refer to the GitHub Wiki page for more details.
